message.content:
{"id": "9654", "title": "Bug 9654: Modify Parameters - Dialog details", "description": "When modifying parameters in the 'Modify Parameters' dialog, the following issues were identified:
1. Duplicated name validation could be performed on the first page.
2. The first and second column could be merged.

", "OB": "1. There is a large marking between the button and the list. The top button should be aligned with the top of the dialog.
2. The table should have a label so it can contain a mnemonic.
3. Multiple selection should be allowed as 'Move Up'/'Move Down' action can be applied on more than one item.
4. The signature preview should be a label that wraps text.
5. It would be nice if the signature preview has the background color set to the same color as a hover effect.", "EB": "1. Reduce the space between the button and list, align the top button with the top of the dialog.
2. Add a label to the table to support mnemonic input.
3. Enable multiple selection in the table.
4. Make the signature preview a label with text wrapping.
5. Set the background color of the signature preview to match the hover effect color.", "SR": ""}

origin.input_prompt:
Your role is a senior software engineer, you are very good at analyzing and writing bug reports.
It is possible that the bug report may lack sufficient details in the OB, EB, and SR sections.  In such cases, your task is to infer the appropriate details based on the context and supplement the bug report to ensure it contains clear and complete OB/EB/SR statements.  Also, improve the wording of these statements for clarity where possible.
To facilitate this process, please provide your responses in JSON format as follows:
{"id": "", "title": "", "description": "", "OB": "", "EB": "", "SR": ""}
origin.input_content:
<BUG REPORT>
{'id': '9654', 'title': 'Bug 9654Modify Parameters: Dialog details', 'description': 'Bug 9654Modify Parameters: Dialog details duplicated name validation could be performed on the first pagei. the first and second column could be mergedj. ', 'OB': '', 'EB': 'marking between button and list is too large, top button should be alignedwith dialog topc. the table should have a label so it can contain a mnemonicd. multiple selection should be allowed, as move up / down can be applied onmore that one itemf. signature preview must be a label that warps. It would be nice if the signature preview has the backaground color set tothe same color as a hoverh. ', 'SR': ''}
